item.title: AWS private zone cross-account peering
item.author: asdrubal@juniqe.com (Asdrubal Gonzalez Penton)
item.description: HOWTO Requirements: AWS Account or Role access. aws-google-auth installed docker and docker-compose installed. Git installed. It’s possible to resolve internal zone records from one vpc to another in different account. For example: We have the account juniqe-production with zone juniqe-production (zone id ZONEIDJPR) and juniqe-main account with vpc vpc-7main; The goal is to make zone juniqe-production resolvable inside juniqe-main. To do so: Get the repository juniqe-infra for Gitlab: git clone https://gitlab.
